anathema: apologize for making an incorrect prediction, disrespect mothers, accept payment for fortune-telling
area_of_concern_raw: destiny, fate, and the aging process.
edict: make predictions of the future, offer advice and guidance to those in positions of power, provide comfort to the elderly
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=322)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 240 <sup>1.1</sup>

In the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26), some mortals worship [norns](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3108) as deities, while others, especially [witches](/Classes.aspx?ID=38) and [bards](/Classes.aspx?ID=32), admire them as patrons or muses. Those who uphold norns as deities are known as Followers of Fate. Norns neither discourage this veneration nor go out of their way to support such worship. [Clerics](/Classes.aspx?ID=33) who venerate norns might worship a specific norn or norn triumvirate, or all norns as a whole, but they gain the same benefits regardless of their choice. The religious symbol of Followers of Fate is a pair of shears cutting a golden thread, and their areas of concern are destiny, fate, and the aging process.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** make predictions of the future, offer advice and guidance to those in positions of power, provide comfort to the elderly

**Anathema** apologize for making an incorrect prediction, disrespect mothers, accept payment for fortune-telling

**Area of Concern**
destiny, fate, and the aging process.

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [Shears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=446)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=75), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=1603)

- **2nd**
[Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)

- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1466)

</column>
name: Followers of Fate
